articles.description: Mr. Assange, the founder of WikiLeaks, took refuge in the Ecuadorean Embassy in London in 2012. He was arrested there on Thursday after Ecuador revoked his asylum status.

articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.title: Nvidia’s latest driver brings ray tracing to GTX-series graphics cards - The Verge
articles.description: If you own a compatible GTX-series graphics card, Nvidia’s latest driver will enable ray tracing in games that support it. This is your chance to try it out before upgrading. However, don’t expect miracles when it comes to performance.
articles.content: Nvidia has released a new driver that allows ray tracing effects to be switched on in GeForce GTX 10- and 16-series graphics cards, such as the GTX 1080 and the GTX 1660. Ray tracing is a resource-intensive feature that makes rendering lighting, shadows, and … [+1916 chars]
